name: A Mimic's Lust for Treasure
description:
In this pixel art top-down shooter, you play as a greedy mimic on a quest for riches in a desert temple filled with demons and devils. The twist? Your health and ammunition is represented by the gold you hoard, so you must constantly fight and collect gold to survive.

As you accumulate more and more gold, you can purchase powerful treasures that enhance your abilities and make you even more deadly. But be careful not to get too greedy, as demons and devils will stop at nothing to take your gold and end your lust for treasure.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Attack: Left Click

Credits:

Music: Desert of Lost Souls by Kevin MacLeod
